Package org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.certextensions

Interface CustomCVCertificateExtension

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CustomCertificateExtension
    public interface CustomCVCertificateExtension
extends CustomCertificateExtension
    Additional interface for custom CV (Card Verifiable) Certificate extensions.
    Version:
    $Id: CustomCVCertificateExtension.java 27581 2017-12-19 08:40:07Z samuellb $

    • Method Detail

      • getValueCVC

        org.ejbca.cvc.CVCDiscretionaryDataTemplate getValueCVC​(EndEntityInformation userData,
                                                       CA ca,
                                                       CertificateProfile certProfile,
                                                       PublicKey userPublicKey,
                                                       PublicKey caPublicKey,
                                                       CertificateValidity validity,
                                                       CertificateExtensionLocation extensionLocation)
                                                throws CertificateExtensionException
        Constructs the Discretionary Data Template object for the certificate extension.
        Parameters:
        userData - End Entity information, or null in CSRs and link certificates.
        ca - Issuing CA.
        certProfile - Certificate profile.
        userPublicKey - Public key of user.
        caPublicKey - Public key of CA, or old public key in link certificates. Null in CSRs.
        validity - Validity, or null in CSRs and link certificates.
        extensionLocation - location
        Returns:
        The Discretionary Data Template object
        Throws:
        CertificateExtensionException - In case of encoding errors etc.

      • isIncludedInCertificates

        boolean isIncludedInCertificates()
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is to be included in certificates.

      • isIncludedInCSR

        boolean isIncludedInCSR()
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is to be included in CSRs.

      • isIncludedInLinkCertificates

        boolean isIncludedInLinkCertificates()
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is to be included in link certificates.
